trends: There have been 10 other sightings in St Joseph
There were no other sightings in St Joseph on or around July 15th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side on my frount porch and I saw a light south (wich is ssw of where I was standing) of the airport going east accross the sky. At first I thought it came from the airport. I called my son out to see. we watched the light move to a southernly position accross the horizon. It paused for a split second and turned red then vanished. I want to say it shot stright up into the sky but it was gone so fast I couldnt tell.
Summary: light moved accross sky, stoped, changed color then dissapeared
